name: Ballpark Wallet (Go-Ahead Pay)
description:
As a Ballpark user(supported for specific clubs), I want to know the information needed to enter the stadium by facial recognition so that I successfully enrolled in the GoAhead-Entry program

Wiki: [Go-Ahead Pay](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/BET/pages/4492623873/Go-Ahead+Pay+Pilot )

BPClient specific JIRAs
* MLB Wallet - Add Data Tier Implementation to Event Hub - Wallet Implementation Only[BP-11082](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-11082 )
* Update String Display for Go-Ahead Pay [BP-11164](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-11164)
